Description:
Create and maintain property listings on various real estate platforms
Collect and organize all necessary documentation related to properties, including contracts, agreements, and permits
Prepare and process documents for real estate transactions, such as leases, sales agreements, and closing documents
Manage and update property databases and CRM systems
Liaise with clients, agents, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth communication and transactions
Respond to inquiries and requests from clients, agents, and other stakeholders in a timely and professional manner
Assist in marketing and advertising properties to attract potential buyers or tenants
Maintain confidentiality of all sensitive information related to the properties and transactions.Skills
Skills: Executive Personal Assistant for the CEO of company with a minimum experience of 1 year with the company management

Proven experience as a Real Estate Admin or similar role
Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
Strong attention to detail and accuracy
Knowledge of real estate laws and regulations
Proficient in Microsoft Office and real estate software programs
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
